message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE. 

The paper deals with the task of automatic argument generation, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with the intersection of computer science and linguistics. The paper also involves retrieval systems and models, which are common in sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of large-scale datasets and evaluation metrics suggests a connection to sub-categories such as cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
